about_the_game:
Welcome to Deadline, an exhilarating VR corridor shooter that thrusts you into the heart of a futuristic battle against relentless robotic foes. As an elite operative, your mission is to navigate through high-tech corridors, armed with an array of powerful weapons and advanced combat skills, to eliminate waves of robots that stand in your way.

Immerse yourself in a world where every corner could be a new challenge, every enemy a test of your prowess. Utilize a diverse arsenal, from energy blasters to heavy plasma rifles, and master deadly combos to dispatch enemies with style and efficiency. The intuitive VR controls bring a new level of immersion, making every firefight an intense and visceral experience.

As you progress through each level, the stakes get higher, with tougher enemies and more complex environments. Adapt to the ever-evolving threats, strategize your attacks, and push your limits to unlock new levels and challenges.

Deadline is not just a game; it's a test of skill, reflexes, and tactical thinking. Are you ready to face the future and conquer the robotic uprising?

Welcome to Deadline, an exhilarating VR corridor shooter that thrusts you into the heart of a futuristic battle against relentless robotic foes. As an elite operative, your mission is to navigate through high-tech corridors, armed with an array of powerful weapons and advanced combat skills, to eliminate waves of robots that stand in your way.

Immerse yourself in a world where every corner could be a new challenge, every enemy a test of your prowess. Utilize a diverse arsenal, from energy blasters to heavy plasma rifles, and master deadly combos to dispatch enemies with style and efficiency. The intuitive VR controls bring a new level of immersion, making every firefight an intense and visceral experience.

As you progress through each level, the stakes get higher, with tougher enemies and more complex environments. Adapt to the ever-evolving threats, strategize your attacks, and push your limits to unlock new levels and challenges.

Deadline is not just a game; it's a test of skill, reflexes, and tactical thinking. Are you ready to face the future and conquer the robotic uprising?
name: Deadline

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: i7-9700K or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 / RX 5700 XT equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, USB 3.0 ports
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Step into the future with Deadline, a VR corridor shooter that pits you against relentless robotic enemies. Arm yourself with a variety of weapons, master lethal combos, and navigate through challenging levels. Can you survive the robotic onslaught and unlock the secrets of the future?
